section.title: Virtual Machine Pool Administrator Roles Explained

formalpara.title: Pool Permission Roles
formalpara.para: The table below describes the administrator roles and privileges applicable to pool administration.

table.title: Red Hat Virtualization System Administrator Roles

row.entry: System Administrator role of a virtual pool.
Can create, delete, and configure a virtual pool, assign and remove virtual pool users, and perform basic operations on a virtual machine.
Can use, create, delete, manage all virtual machine pools in a specific cluster.
